nodes.text: The SE-Vigilant automated sensor was a type of lightweight sensor pod attached to a 1.6 meter collapsible post primarily used by homesteads, militia groups, and big game hunters. The SE-Vigilant transmitted its signals to designated comlinks, datapads, computer systems, or even droids, and could continuously transmit for decades through a small solar panel.

The beacon was equipped with two sensors attached. The first was a motion sensor with video and audio capable of detecting targets up to long range. Once the first sensor was triggered, the second performed a closer scan, and transmitted infrared, ultraviolet, density, electromagnetic, and frequency data.
The SE-Vigilant automated sensor was mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
